## createDefaultRenderInput() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns a default function for rendering the input component of the `CountryCodeSelector`<!-- -->'s `Autocomplete` component. See [https://mui.com/material-ui/api/autocomplete/\#autocomplete-prop-renderInput](https://mui.com/material-ui/api/autocomplete/#autocomplete-prop-renderInput) for more information about the `renderInput` prop.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createDefaultRenderInput(label: string, shrink?: boolean, variant?: TextFieldVariants): (params: AutocompleteRenderInputParams) => import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element;
```

CountryCodeSelector component's label passed to the input component.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Indicates whether to shrink the label or not.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

variant


</td><td>

TextFieldVariants


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Variant of the `TextField` component to use.


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

(params: AutocompleteRenderInputParams) =&gt; import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element

A function for rendering the input component of the `CountryCodeSelector`<!-- -->'s `Autocomplete` component.
